BattleEffectText.Name: Blink of Scent
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can't get either Presence for {0} Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Hammer and Nail
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon a successful Pierce attack, inflict 2 'Nail' to the target. Blunt attack will remove all stacks 'Nail' on the target, deal 5 damage for each stack removed this way.

BattleEffectText.Name: Guilt
BattleEffectText.Desc: Add a copy of "Guilt" to all enemies' hand. Reduce incoming damage from enemy with "Guilt" on hand by the cost of "Guilt".

BattleEffectText.Name: Blizzard
BattleEffectText.Desc: inflict Immobilize to a random non-Immobilized enemy.

BattleEffectText.Name: Soul Link
BattleEffectText.Desc: Stagger Resist does not go below 1. Reduce one stack if both characters lose a clash with the same enemy in the same Scene. When stack reaches 0, both charactes lose 25% Max Stagger Resist and gain 4 Paralysis.

BattleEffectText.Name: Tag Team Xï¼š Y
BattleEffectText.Desc: When using Pages, trigger effect Y if an ally using Page X (Tag Teammate) exist. One Page X can only trigger once such effect

BattleEffectText.Name: Learn
BattleEffectText.Desc: Can Use the Combat Page 'Learn' infinitely. If this character's attack hits, it inflicts a 'Lies' status which changes the Costs of pages at random next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Nail and Hammer
BattleEffectText.Desc: For this Scene, successful hit will inflict one of Slash Nail, Pierce Nail and Blunt Nail according to the attack. Perform another succesful hit with different attack in the same Scene will proc Nail's effect and remove it. Otherwise increase the stack by 1.

BattleEffectText.Name: Slash Nail
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon being hit by a Slash die by a character with "Nail and Hammer" passive, increase stack by 1. Otherwise, gain 3 Blead 1 Fragile for each stack next Scene and remove this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pierce Nail
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon being hit by a Pierce die by character with "Nail and Hammer" passive, increase stack by 1. Otherwise, take 5 Damage for each stack and remove this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Blunt Nail
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon being hit by a Blunt die by character with "Nail and Hammer" passive, increase stack by 1. Otherwise, take 5 Stagger Damage for each stack and remove this status.

BattleEffectText.Name: Guilt
BattleEffectText.Desc: On Clash, reduce incoming Damage from attack by dice's Power. When hit by a one-side attack, increase incoming Damage by 2-4

BattleEffectText.Name: Blizzard
BattleEffectText.Desc: Inflict 3 Bind to all other characters

BattleEffectText.Name: Pulsation
BattleEffectText.Desc: Speed Dice Slot -1. On hit, give 1 Strength to all allies next Scene (once per Page). If the character couldn't deal any damage by the end of the Scene, take 15 Stagger damage.

BattleEffectText.Name: Fervent Beats
BattleEffectText.Desc: Gain 2 Strength and Endurance, 3 Haste, and 4 Protection this Scene. Reduce the number of passive abilities recieved next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Sword of Frost
BattleEffectText.Desc: On Hit, deal 2-4 Damage and Stagger Damage if target's speed is lower than the character.

BattleEffectText.Name: Pale Hands
BattleEffectText.Desc: Upon performing 3 succesful hits on same character inflict additional 3-10 Stagger Damage this round.

BattleEffectText.Name: Memory - The Blue Reverberation
BattleEffectText.Desc: After {0} Scene, inflict 1 Nullify Power on hit.
